title: • Square
content: I joined Square in 2017 as a Senior Product Designer for Square for Restaurants – Square's vertical POS solution for Restaurants. I worked alongside two designers across a number of surfaces. My primary focus was the Kitchen Display System but also was deeply involved in the design and development of our point-of-sale and restaurant management solutions.

Square Kitchen Display System is a modern, intuitive interface for restaurant staff to manage orders, track inventory, and communicate with the front of house. At the core of the system is a kitchen ticket, or chit, that displays key order details and actions enabling quick and efficient order fulfillment.

To augment the KDS, we designed a sidebar that gave kitchen staff access to tools that provided additional tools that could make order fulfillment more efficient. This sidebar, called Launchpad, was a pattern that we expanded on the Restaurant Poitn of Sale prouct.
We designed a bulk management mode that allowed kitchen staff to manage orders in bulk which helped keep the kitchen out of the weeds.
